required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Non-inferiority Evaluation of Pain Intensity After Biomatrop (Somatropin) Application in Relation to Hormotrop (Somatropin), in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: National, Monocentric, Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled, Crossover Clinical Trial, to Evaluate the Non-inferiority of Pain Intensity After the Application of Recombinant Human Somatropin - Biomatrop (Biosintética Farmacêutica) in Relation to Recombinant Human Somatotropin - Hormotrop (Bergamo), Single Dose, in Healthy Subjects of Both Genders

brief_summary.textblock: Randomized, Double-blind, Controlled, Crossover, in which 68 subjects (34 males and 34 females) will receive, in each stage, an application of 4 UI, subcutaneous, single dose, of the investigational drug (Recombinant Human Somatropin - Biomatrop) and the comparator (Recombinant Human Somatropin - Hormotrop) according to randomization to evaluate the Non-inferiority of Pain Intensity After the Application of Hormotrop, using Visual Analogue Scale (0-10cm) and record the incidence of adverse events.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Report the Pain Intensity using Visual Analogue Scale (0-10cm)

arm_group.description: A single dose of Recombinant Human Somatropin - Biomatrop is administered. The pain intensity is evaluated using visual analogue scale (0-10cm) and record the incidence of adverse events.
A single dose of Recombinant Human Somatropin - Hormotrop is administered. The pain intensity is evaluated using visual analogue scale (0-10cm) and record the incidence of adverse events.

intervention.description: The subjects who recieve Biomatrop first, after a period maximum of 24 hours will recieve a dose of Hormotrop.
The subjects who recieve Hormotrop first, after a period maximum of 24 hours will recieve a dose of Biomatrop.
